Silence::

She looked up at Malice, looked down at his rifle, then back up at his
face plates. "You would be correct. I am the one who activated the
beacon."  She had a slightly worried look on her face. A program from
the past was trying to activate, but wouldn't. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice::
>  
> Malice slowly approached Wolfblade's position, and upon hearing her
conversing calmly with someone, figured she had found the bot they had
been looking for.  He walked up and stood beside Wolfblade, his rifle
at his side.  He regarded the smaller bot for a moment, tilting his
head to the side for a moment.
>  
> "I assume you are the one who activated the beacon.  I guess we can
tell Kup to chill for a bit."
>  
> He then opens a channel to base, informing Kup they had the bot and
was ready to return to base.  He didn't ever think his appearance
would be threatening in anyway, he did look scary according to a few
sources.
>
